column4: I am trying to ./configure a application (gbindadmin) and im getting an error with gcc, checking for C compiler default output file name... configure: error: C compiler cannot create executables any ideas?
if not type "sudo apt-get install build-essential"
sub: not sure let me see
seems like im missing another file now, go figure =P...anyway "checking for PACKAGE... configure: error: Package requirements (gtk+-2.0 >= 1.3.13) were not met:"

im trying to install gbindadmin gui for bind9
well Auedian, im not sure, i need to go grab something to eat, so maybe worth asking someone else
